trans-unit.resname: Music is...
trans-unit.source: Music is...
trans-unit.target: La musica è...

trans-unit.resname:
Music comes from urgency and a vital necessity to share one's voice, one's soul, one's presence. A tool to develop a critical sense of our experience in the society in which we live.
Making music focuses on the person who creates, who speaks and the person who listens; it is the beginning and the end of a cyclical path towards self-determination. It is a medium for touching people's hearts, for communicating an image, an idea, a concept, for giving meaning to the perception of reality.
trans-unit.source:
Music comes from urgency and a vital necessity to share one's voice, one's soul, one's presence. A tool to develop a critical sense of our experience in the society in which we live.
Making music focuses on the person who creates, who speaks and the person who listens; it is the beginning and the end of a cyclical path towards self-determination. It is a medium for touching people's hearts, for communicating an image, an idea, a concept, for giving meaning to the perception of reality.
trans-unit.target:
La musica è urgenza e necessità impellente di condivisione della propria voce, della propria anima, della propria presenza. Uno strumento per sviluppare un senso critico sulla nostra esperienza nella società in cui viviamo.
Fare musica, mette al centro la persona che crea, che parla e la persona che ascolta; è il principio e la fine di un percorso ciclico verso l’autodeterminazione. Un mezzo per toccare il cuore delle persone, per comunicare un’immagine, un’idea, un concetto, per dare un senso alla percezione della realtà.

trans-unit.resname: Music creates bridges between the inner world and the outer world. It allows us to translate the secrets of the soul into a sensitive form, those secrets that we cannot explain but that sometimes succeed in escaping through the notes and rhythm.
trans-unit.source: Music creates bridges between the inner world and the outer world. It allows us to translate the secrets of the soul into a sensitive form, those secrets that we cannot explain but that sometimes succeed in escaping through the notes and rhythm.
trans-unit.target: La musica crea un ponte tra il mondo interiore e il mondo esteriore. Permette di tradurre in forma sensibile, i segreti dell’anima, segreti che neanche noi stessi sappiamo spiegare ma che a volte riescono a fuoriuscire attraverso le note.

trans-unit.resname: "I experience music almost maniacally, I have been doing it since I was a kid. Through music, and particularly through singing, I am able toundertake a path of research and reflection on issues that are central to me, such as identity, , or rather, our identities, which are fluid, changeable, never identical to themselves, in a movement that destroys any idea of a physical or imaginary border between 'Us' and 'Them'".
trans-unit.source: "I experience music almost maniacally, I have been doing it since I was a kid. Through music, and particularly through singing, I am able toundertake a path of research and reflection on issues that are central to me, such as identity, , or rather, our identities, which are fluid, changeable, never identical to themselves, in a movement that destroys any idea of a physical or imaginary border between 'Us' and 'Them'".
trans-unit.target: “Vivo la musica in modo quasi maniacale, la faccio da quando ero ragazzino. Attraverso la musica, e in modo particolare attraverso il canto, riesco a intraprendere un percorso di ricerca e di riflessione su questioni per me centrali come l’identità, , o meglio, le nostre identità, fluide, mutevoli, mai identiche a se stesse, in un movimento che annienta ogni idea di confine fisico e immaginario tra il “Noi” e il “Loro”.

trans-unit.resname: "Music has been, and still is, a fundamental element of my existence. There is no musical genre, I start with my two instruments, the voice and the guitar. And from there I start to work, to build, to tell a story. I try to give shape to an aesthetic, the framework of a journey through my musical universes such as soul, jazz, reggae, electronic music... I let myself be crossed by this baggage and then give birth to deeply hybrid songs."
trans-unit.source: "Music has been, and still is, a fundamental element of my existence. There is no musical genre, I start with my two instruments, the voice and the guitar. And from there I start to work, to build, to tell a story. I try to give shape to an aesthetic, the framework of a journey through my musical universes such as soul, jazz, reggae, electronic music... I let myself be crossed by this baggage and then give birth to deeply hybrid songs."
trans-unit.target: "La Musica è stata, lo è tuttora, un elemento fondamentale della mia esistenza. Non esiste un genere musicale, parto dai miei due strumenti, la voce e la chitarra. E da li inizio a lavorare, a costruire, a raccontare una storia. Cerco di dare forma a un'estetica, la trama di un viaggio tra i miei universi musicali quali il soul, il jazz, il reggae, la musica elettronica…. Mi lascio attraversare da questo bagaglio per poi far nascere brani profondamente ibridi.”

trans-unit.source: Projects
trans-unit.target: Progetti

trans-unit.resname: When music enters

trans-unit.target: Quando la musica entra

trans-unit.resname: your life,
trans-unit.source: your life,
trans-unit.target: nella tua vita,

trans-unit.resname: it is bound to leave an indelible mark
trans-unit.source: it is bound to leave an indelible mark
trans-unit.target: è destinata a lasciare un segno indelebile

trans-unit.resname: Zamua is a singer, guitarist and songwriter born in Sardinia from a Sardinian mother and a Burundian father.
trans-unit.source: Zamua is a singer, guitarist and songwriter born in Sardinia from a Sardinian mother and a Burundian father.
trans-unit.target: Zamua è un cantante, chitarrista e songwriter nato in Sardegna da madre sarda e da padre burundese.

trans-unit.resname: His dream was to become a footballer, but he found himself bedridden after an accident on the football playground. During his convalescence, his friend Deodatus Nduwimana taught him how to play the guitar. "I just wanted to learn Redemption Song, Bob Marley was my hero".
trans-unit.source: His dream was to become a footballer, but he found himself bedridden after an accident on the football playground. During his convalescence, his friend Deodatus Nduwimana taught him how to play the guitar. "I just wanted to learn Redemption Song, Bob Marley was my hero".
trans-unit.target: Il suo sogno era diventare un calciatore, ma si ritrova immobilizzato a letto in seguito a un incidente sul campo da calcio. Durante la convalescenza il suo amico Deodatus Nduwimana gli insegna a suonare la chitarra. « Volevo semplicemente imparare Redemption Song, Bob Marley era il mio eroe ».

trans-unit.resname: This mark remains intact over time, until you realise that the best way to experience music is to make it, to see it come to life...
trans-unit.source: This mark remains intact over time, until you realise that the best way to experience music is to make it, to see it come to life...
trans-unit.target: Questo segno resta intatto col passare del tempo, finché non realizzi che il modo migliore per vivere la musica è farla, vederla nascere…

trans-unit.source: BIOGRAPHY
trans-unit.target: BIOGRAFIA

trans-unit.source: LITANIE
trans-unit.target: LITANIE

trans-unit.resname: LITANIE is Zamua's first EP, produced by the young independent label OD MusicLab. His debut mini-album offers an atypical musical immersion between euphoric moods and litanies, and makes this artist unclassifiable but indispensable.
trans-unit.source: LITANIE is Zamua's first EP, produced by the young independent label OD MusicLab. His debut mini-album offers an atypical musical immersion between euphoric moods and litanies, and makes this artist unclassifiable but indispensable.
trans-unit.target: LITANIE é il primo EP di Zamua, prodotto dalla giovane etichetta indipendente OD MusicLab. Il suo mini-album d’esordio offre un’immersione musicale atipica tra euforie e litanie, e fa di questo artista un elemento inclassificabile ma indispensabile.

trans-unit.resname:
A personal blend
of folk and soul-jazz
trans-unit.source:
A personal blend
of folk and soul-jazz
trans-unit.target:
Un intreccio personale
tra folk e soul-jazz

trans-unit.resname: BIOGRAPHY
trans-unit.source: BIOGRAPHY
trans-unit.target: BIOGRAFIA

trans-unit.resname: Zamua is a singer, guitarist and songwriter born in Sardinia to a Sardinian mother and a Burundian father.
trans-unit.source: Zamua is a singer, guitarist and songwriter born in Sardinia to a Sardinian mother and a Burundian father.
trans-unit.target: Zamua è un cantante, chitarrista e songwriter nato in Sardegna da madre sarda e da padre burundese.

trans-unit.resname: He began his approach to singing and guitar almost by chance, as a teenager, during a long period of convalescence that saw him bedridden. Since then, Zamua has dedicated himself to music and writing, developing a personal and exciting blend of folk and soul-jazz, along a borderline between analogue and electronic. A hybrid result in which narration and the power of words are essential.
trans-unit.source: He began his approach to singing and guitar almost by chance, as a teenager, during a long period of convalescence that saw him bedridden. Since then, Zamua has dedicated himself to music and writing, developing a personal and exciting blend of folk and soul-jazz, along a borderline between analogue and electronic. A hybrid result in which narration and the power of words are essential.
trans-unit.target: Inizia l’approccio al canto e alla chitarra quasi per caso, da adolescente, durante un lungo periodo di convalescenza che lo vede costretto a letto. Da allora, Zamua si dedica alla musica e alla scrittura sviluppando un intreccio personale e emozionante tra folk e soul-jazz, lungo una linea di confine tra l’analogico e l’elettronico. Un risultato meticcio in cui la narrazione e la forza della parola sono essenziali.

trans-unit.resname: A continuous exploration of his different musical identities, including soul, blues, folk, jazz and reggae vibes.
trans-unit.source: A continuous exploration of his different musical identities, including soul, blues, folk, jazz and reggae vibes.
trans-unit.target: Un continuo percorso esplorativo delle sue diverse identità musicali, tra vibrazioni soul, blues, folk, jazz, reggae.

trans-unit.resname: In his hometown, in 1996, he formed his first group Cant'nde Reggae with his friend Mastrone (S. Piras) on vocal and F. Ortu on drums, M.Masala on keyboards, L.Devito on transverse flute, G.Demontis on bass, M.Barubiriza, M. Carroni and P. Musina on backing vocals, AbuMar on percussion and Zamua (guitar and vocals). Cant'ndeReggae lived between cellars and garages, in a context of artistic and creative ferment that give birth to various groups and musical realities reggae, jazz, rock, punk, ska, rap (Vok Rebelde, Seditio Plebeia, SMP, Menarka, Cosca Smeralda Quartet, Reggae Realidad ...). All underground realities that grew by communicating with each other, feeding and stimulating each other. The nickname Zamua was born in this period.
trans-unit.source: In his hometown, in 1996, he formed his first group Cant'nde Reggae with his friend Mastrone (S. Piras) on vocal and F. Ortu on drums, M.Masala on keyboards, L.Devito on transverse flute, G.Demontis on bass, M.Barubiriza, M. Carroni and P. Musina on backing vocals, AbuMar on percussion and Zamua (guitar and vocals). Cant'ndeReggae lived between cellars and garages, in a context of artistic and creative ferment that give birth to various groups and musical realities reggae, jazz, rock, punk, ska, rap (Vok Rebelde, Seditio Plebeia, SMP, Menarka, Cosca Smeralda Quartet, Reggae Realidad ...). All underground realities that grew by communicating with each other, feeding and stimulating each other. The nickname Zamua was born in this period.
trans-unit.target: Nel 1996, forma con Mastrone (S. Piras) il suo primo gruppo Cant’nde Reggae (F. Ortu alla batteria, M.Masala alle tastiere, L.Devito al flauto traverso, G.Demontis al basso, M.Barubiriza, M. Carroni, P.Musina ai cori, AbuMar alle Percussioni, Mastrone alla voce e Zamua alla chitarra e voce), a Nuoro, tra cantine e garage, in un contesto di fermento artistico e creativo che vedeva il formarsi di diversi gruppi e realtà musicali reggae, jazz, rock, punk, ska, rap (Vok Rebelde, Seditio Plebeia, SMP, Menarka, Cosca Smeralda Quartet, Reggae Realidad…). Tutte realtà underground che crescevano comunicando tra loro, alimentandosi e stimolandosi a vicenda. In questo periodo nasce il soprannome Zamua.

trans-unit.resname: Music became part of his life almost as a necessity, the need to build a bridge between his different roots. Always moved by a deep and intimate search, Zamua goes on a journey in the company of his guitar and his voice.
trans-unit.source: Music became part of his life almost as a necessity, the need to build a bridge between his different roots. Always moved by a deep and intimate search, Zamua goes on a journey in the company of his guitar and his voice.
trans-unit.target: La musica entra a far parte della sua vita quasi come una necessità, il bisogno di costruire un ponte tra le sue diverse radici. Sempre alla ricerca di sé, Zamua parte in viaggio in compagnia della sua chitarra e della sua voce.

trans-unit.resname:
A personal blend
of folk and soul-jazz
trans-unit.source:
A personal blend
of folk and soul-jazz
trans-unit.target:
Un intreccio personale
tra folk e soul-jazz

trans-unit.resname: In 2003, Zamua began working on a new project co-founded with keyboard player and producer Alessandro Capasso (Collettivo Cerchi e Xhu): ElephantAndCastle (A. Capasso on keyboards, programming and vocals, D. Sorrentino on bass, C. D'Avino on drums, R. Crispino on percussion and Zamua on guitar and vocals). An afro-jazz project, whose real "raison d'être" is the fusion of genres.
trans-unit.source: In 2003, Zamua began working on a new project co-founded with keyboard player and producer Alessandro Capasso (Collettivo Cerchi e Xhu): ElephantAndCastle (A. Capasso on keyboards, programming and vocals, D. Sorrentino on bass, C. D'Avino on drums, R. Crispino on percussion and Zamua on guitar and vocals). An afro-jazz project, whose real "raison d'être" is the fusion of genres.
trans-unit.target: Nel 2003, Zamua inizia a lavorare a un nuovo progetto co-fondato con il tastierista e produttore Alessandro Capasso ((Collettivo Cerchi e Xhu) : ElephantAndCastle (A.Capasso alle tastiere, programming e voce, D.Sorrentino al basso, C.D’Avino alla batteria, R.Crispino alle percussioni e Zamua alla chitarra e voce). Un progetto d’impronta afro-jazz, la cui vera ragione d'essere è la fusione di generi.

trans-unit.resname: Zamua's passion for experimentation takes more and more shape and space within his creative and writing process.
trans-unit.source: Zamua's passion for experimentation takes more and more shape and space within his creative and writing process.
trans-unit.target: Il gusto per la sperimentazione prende sempre più forma e spazio nel processo creativo e di scrittura di Zamua.

trans-unit.resname: After a "short" parenthesis of 6 months in Tanzania and 6 months in Egypt, in 2006, Zamua moved to France, in Paris, where he continued his studies in Sociology of Migration. He became interested in the law of foreigners and asylum and began to work with associations that accompany asylum seekers through the difficult legal and administrative procedures involved in obtaining refugee status.
trans-unit.source: After a "short" parenthesis of 6 months in Tanzania and 6 months in Egypt, in 2006, Zamua moved to France, in Paris, where he continued his studies in Sociology of Migration. He became interested in the law of foreigners and asylum and began to work with associations that accompany asylum seekers through the difficult legal and administrative procedures involved in obtaining refugee status.
trans-unit.target: Dopo una “breve” parentesi di 6 mesi in Tanzania e di 6 mesi in Egitto, nel 2006, Zamua approda in Francia, a Parigi, dove prosegue i suoi studi di Sociologia delle migrazioni. Si interessa al diritto degli stranieri e al diritto d’asilo e inizia a lavorare con associazioni che accompagnano i richiedenti asilo nelle difficili procedure giuridiche e amministrative volte al riconoscimento dello status di rifugiato.

trans-unit.resname: It was here that Zamua's solo project took shape.
trans-unit.source: It was here that Zamua's solo project took shape.
trans-unit.target: Qui prende forma il progetto solista di Zamua.

trans-unit.resname: He continued writing and performing live in clubs in the French capital. Meetings and friendships give impetus and contribute to the maturation of his project. During this period, the meet and artistic collaboration with producer-sound designer Shay Mané, sound engineer Fabrice Ho-Shui-Ling and photographer-artistic director Chloé Dupeyrat (Acidulée Production) was significant in his journey.
trans-unit.source: He continued writing and performing live in clubs in the French capital. Meetings and friendships give impetus and contribute to the maturation of his project. During this period, the meet and artistic collaboration with producer-sound designer Shay Mané, sound engineer Fabrice Ho-Shui-Ling and photographer-artistic director Chloé Dupeyrat (Acidulée Production) was significant in his journey.
trans-unit.target: Continua la scrittura e le performance live nei club della capitale francese. Gli incontri e le amicizie danno slancio e contribuiscono a far maturare il suo progetto. In questo periodo, l'incontro e la collaborazione artistica con l’artista e produttore Shay Mané, l'ingegnere del suono Fabrice Ho-Shui-Ling e la fotografa-direttrice artistica Chloé Dupeyrat (Acidulée Production) è stato significativo nel suo percorso.

trans-unit.resname:
Identity, migration, racism, the physical and spiritual journey are central issues in his music, as a source of inspiration and an essential matter for work and reflection.
The distancing from what is stable and firm, the idea of a sacred journey envelops most of his songs. His lyrics, without ever openly referring to autobiography, tell a complex story of human relationships and emotional connections between things and experiences.
trans-unit.source:
Identity, migration, racism, the physical and spiritual journey are central issues in his music, as a source of inspiration and an essential matter for work and reflection.
The distancing from what is stable and firm, the idea of a sacred journey envelops most of his songs. His lyrics, without ever openly referring to autobiography, tell a complex story of human relationships and emotional connections between things and experiences.
trans-unit.target:
L’identità, la migrazione, il razzismo, il viaggio fisico e spirituale sono temi che trovano ampio spazio nella sua musica, come fonte di ispirazione e materia su cui lavorare e riflettere.
L’allontanamento da ciò che è stabile e fermo, il profumo del viaggio avvolgono la maggior parte delle sue canzoni. I suoi testi, senza mai rifarsi apertamente all’autobiografia, raccontano una complessa trama di relazioni umane e connessioni emotive tra le cose ed il vissuto.

trans-unit.resname: The result is a music made up of mixtures and connections that lead Zamua to meet and collaborate with other artists from the national and international jazz scene such as Raffaele Casarano, Flavio Boltro and Paolo Fresu.
trans-unit.source: The result is a music made up of mixtures and connections that lead Zamua to meet and collaborate with other artists from the national and international jazz scene such as Raffaele Casarano, Flavio Boltro and Paolo Fresu.
trans-unit.target: Nasce una musica fatta di commistioni e di aperture che portano Zamua a incontrare e a collaborare con altri artisti della scena jazz nazionale e internazionale come Raffaele Casarano, Flavio Boltro e Paolo Fresu.

trans-unit.resname: The OD MusicLab label (Shay Mané and Fabrice Ho-Shui-Ling) accompanied him in the production of his first EP entitled Litanie.
trans-unit.source: The OD MusicLab label (Shay Mané and Fabrice Ho-Shui-Ling) accompanied him in the production of his first EP entitled Litanie.
trans-unit.target: L’etichetta OD MusicLab (Shay Mané e Fabrice Ho-Shui-Ling) lo accompagna nella produzione del suo primo EP dal titolo Litanie.

trans-unit.resname:
A borderline
between analogue and electronic.
trans-unit.source:
A borderline
between analogue and electronic.
trans-unit.target:
Una linea di confine
tra l'analogico e l'elettronico.

trans-unit.source: Cookies
trans-unit.target: Cookies

trans-unit.resname: Our website uses cookies :some small text files that are sent to your terminal during your visit.
trans-unit.source: Our website uses cookies :some small text files that are sent to your terminal during your visit.
trans-unit.target: Il nostrao sito utlizza i cookies : dei piccoli file testo che vengono inviati al vostro terminale durante la vostra visita.

trans-unit.resname: These text files are used to make your browsing experience on the site more efficient.
trans-unit.source: These text files are used to make your browsing experience on the site more efficient.
trans-unit.target: Questi file testo vengono utilizzati per rendere più efficente l'esperienza di navigazione sul sito dell'utente

trans-unit.resname: The cookies used are "technical cookies", i.e. they are strictly necessary for the operation of this site. Users' prior consent is not required for the installation and use of technical cookies, as the data managed by the session or navigation cookies are used for the sole purpose of checking and guaranteeing the correct functioning of the service offered or to obtain anonymous statistical information on the use of the website.
trans-unit.source: The cookies used are "technical cookies", i.e. they are strictly necessary for the operation of this site. Users' prior consent is not required for the installation and use of technical cookies, as the data managed by the session or navigation cookies are used for the sole purpose of checking and guaranteeing the correct functioning of the service offered or to obtain anonymous statistical information on the use of the website.
trans-unit.target: _I cookies utilizzati sono, "cookies tecnici" ovvero strettamente necessari per il funzionamento di questo sito. Per l'installazione e l'utilizzo dei cookie tecnici non è richiesto il preventivo consenso degli utenti, poiché i dati gestiti dai cookie di sessione o navigazione vengono utilizzati al solo fine di controllare e garantire il corretto funzionamento del servizio offerto o per ricavare informazioni statistiche anonime sull'uso del sito.

trans-unit.resname: Deactivate cookies
trans-unit.source: Deactivate cookies
trans-unit.target: Disattivare i cookies

trans-unit.resname: The User can control his or her choices regarding the use of cookies generally through the settings on his or her browser, through which he or she can decide to make the installation of any type of cookie subject to his or her prior consent or to prevent its installation completely. You are invited to visit the section on cookie settings provided by your browser (Google Chrome, Safari, Mozilla Firefox, Internet Explorer).
trans-unit.source: The User can control his or her choices regarding the use of cookies generally through the settings on his or her browser, through which he or she can decide to make the installation of any type of cookie subject to his or her prior consent or to prevent its installation completely. You are invited to visit the section on cookie settings provided by your browser (Google Chrome, Safari, Mozilla Firefox, Internet Explorer).
trans-unit.target: L'utente puo controllare le proprie scelte sull'utilizzo dei cookies ingenerale tramite le impostazioni del proprio browser, attraverso le quali può decidere di subordinare l’installazione di qualsiasi tipo di cookie al proprio consenso preventivo o di impedirne completamente l’installazione. Si invita l’Utente a visitare la rubrica relativa alle impostazioni dei cookies messa a disposizione dal proprio broser (Google Chrome, Safari, Mozilla Firefox, Internet Explorer).

trans-unit.resname: Privacy POLICY
trans-unit.source: Privacy POLICY
trans-unit.target: Privacy POLICY

trans-unit.source: Introduction
trans-unit.target: Introduzione

trans-unit.resname: We consider the protection and respect of your privacy to be of paramount importance. We are therefore committed to respecting the confidentiality of your personal data and to ensuring that they are processed ethically and in full compliance with the regulations in force.
trans-unit.source: We consider the protection and respect of your privacy to be of paramount importance. We are therefore committed to respecting the confidentiality of your personal data and to ensuring that they are processed ethically and in full compliance with the regulations in force.
trans-unit.target: Noi consideriamo di foncadmentale importanza la tutela e il rispetto della privacy dell'utente. Pertanto, ci impegniamo a rispettare la riservatezza dei dati personali e a garantire un trattamento etico e nel pieno rispetto delle norme vigenti.

trans-unit.resname: According to current legislation, each user has the right to access, update, rectify, delete and limit the use of their personal data. The user can exercise this right by contacting our service: personal.data@zamuamusic.com
trans-unit.source: According to current legislation, each user has the right to access, update, rectify, delete and limit the use of their personal data. The user can exercise this right by contacting our service: personal.data@zamuamusic.com

trans-unit.target: L'unica finalità della raccolta e dell'utilizzazione dei dati é la Comunicazione con gli utenti attraverso il

trans-unit.resname:
"The first time I sang in front of someone, I was seven years old and it was in front of ma family. I did something that vaguely sounded like rap.
Nobody at home listened to rap music and I still wonder where I heard that powerful music!
MMy father often listened to some jazz music on Radio Rai 3. I remember Louis Armstrong's trumpet in the morning while we were having breakfast, the voices of Ladysmith Black Mambazo, Tracy Chapman, Luigi Tenco, Lucio Dalla and Fabrizio De André.
Today, when I listen to the recording of that first so-called performance, I understand that when music hits, it leaves an indelible mark... "
trans-unit.source:
"The first time I sang in front of someone, I was seven years old and it was in front of ma family. I did something that vaguely sounded like rap.
Nobody at home listened to rap music and I still wonder where I heard that powerful music!
MMy father often listened to some jazz music on Radio Rai 3. I remember Louis Armstrong's trumpet in the morning while we were having breakfast, the voices of Ladysmith Black Mambazo, Tracy Chapman, Luigi Tenco, Lucio Dalla and Fabrizio De André.
Today, when I listen to the recording of that first so-called performance, I understand that when music hits, it leaves an indelible mark... "
trans-unit.target:
"La prima volta che cantai davanti alla mia famiglia avevo sette anni. Feci qualcosa che somigliava vagamente a un rap.

Mio padre ascoltava spesso il jazz su Radio Rai 3. Mi ricordo la tromba di Louis Amstrong la mattina, mentre facevamo colazione, le voci dei Ladysmith Black Mambazo, di Tracy Chapman, di Luigi Tenco, di Lucio Dalla e di Fabrizio De André.
Oggi, quando riascolto la registrazione di quella prima performance, capisco che quando la musica colpisce, lascia un segno indelebile..."

trans-unit.resname: He landed in Naples, where he began his university studies and founded, in the meantime, Metisse, a reggae roots musical project. With Metisse (A. Rubano on bass, V. Ciorra on guitar, M. Barubiriza and N. Rubano on backing vocals, D. Leone on drums, E. Capasso on keyboards, R. Crispino on percussion and Zamua on guitar and vocals), Zamua continues his melting sound experiences. The very name of the project, Metisse, explains and anticipates the importance of fusion in its aesthetics and the need for a constant search for musical mixtures and multiform artistic influences.
trans-unit.source: He landed in Naples, where he began his university studies and founded, in the meantime, Metisse, a reggae roots musical project. With Metisse (A. Rubano on bass, V. Ciorra on guitar, M. Barubiriza and N. Rubano on backing vocals, D. Leone on drums, E. Capasso on keyboards, R. Crispino on percussion and Zamua on guitar and vocals), Zamua continues his melting sound experiences. The very name of the project, Metisse, explains and anticipates the importance of fusion in its aesthetics and the need for a constant search for musical mixtures and multiform artistic influences.
trans-unit.target: Approda a Napoli, dove inizia gli studi universitari e fonda, in parallelo, Metisse, un progetto musicale dalla marcata impronta reggae roots. Con Metisse (A.Rubano al basso, V.Ciorra alla chitarra, M.Barubiriza e N.Rubano ai cori, D.Leone alla batteria, E.Capasso alle tastiere, R.Crispino alle percussioni e Zamua alla chitarra e voce) , Zamua continua le sue esperienze sonore meticce. Il nome stesso del progetto, Metisse, spiega e anticipa l’importanza che la fusione ricopre nella sua estetica e il bisogno di una ricerca costante di commistioni musicali e contaminazioni multiformi.
